title: Weedify
description: Weedify is a recipe sharing platform that allows users to create, share, and discover recipes. It features a user-friendly interface, a robust search engine, and a community-driven approach to recipe sharing.

title: MyLens
description: MyLens is a social media platform that allows users to share and discover media. It features a clean and modern design, a powerful search engine, and a community-driven approach. The platform enables users to follow, like, comment and save media as favorites.

title: Tataki - Sushi Restaurant
description: Tataki is a sushi restaurant website that showcases modern sushi dishes, offers online ordering, and provides information about the restaurant's history and philosophy. The website is designed to be visually appealing and easy to navigate.
